metadata.dc:author: GRAVANO, L
metadata.dc:subject: PERICARDITIS, ADHESIVE/etiology and pathogenesis
metadata.dc:title: Peridcarditis crónica constrictiva y syndrome diafragmático parietal; como secuelas de una poliserositis tuberculosa.
[Constrictive chronic pericarditis and parietal diaphragmatic syndrome; sequels of tuberculous polyserositis].
